notes.order_interval_minutes: How often to place orders (in minutes). Default: 5
notes.test_symbols: List of symbols to test with. Default: ['RELIANCE']
notes.max_test_orders: Maximum number of test orders to place. Default: 10
notes.alternate_sides: Whether to alternate between BUY and SELL orders. Default: true
notes.usage: Copy the 'config' section to your strategy configuration
